Package p2.DataStructures.Tree

Class BTNode<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V extends Comparable<? super V>>

java.lang.Object
p2.DataStructures.Tree.BTNode<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - Generic type for the key of the values to be stored in the nodes
V - Generic type for the values to be stored in the nodes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<BTNode<K,V>>, BinaryTreePrinter.PrintableNode
public class BTNode<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V extends Comparable<? super V>> extends Object implements BinaryTreePrinter.PrintableNode, Comparable<BTNode<K,V>>
Binary Tree Node Class This class represents a binary tree node with key, value, left child, right child, and parent.
Author:
Juan O. Lopez & Fernando Bermudez
